name: Scrappy Kid
quote: "Hold on! We're going for a ride!"
abilities:
Any Prop is +1 Defense in the hands of the Kid.

Cannot be the target of a 'Large' or 'Monster' attack.
title: Scrappy

name: So-And-So Senior
quote: "Junior! What are you doing here?"
abilities: When Senior comes into play, their Defense, Abilities, and Traits become those of a Character already in your Movie, plus the additional Traits 'Old' and 'Family'.
title: Dad

name: Bush Pilot
quote: “You want me to fly CLOSER to the volcano???”
abilities: Defense = 6 if they have a 'Flying' Prop or are at a 'Flying' Location.
title: Jungle

name: Cannibal Pygmies in the Jungle of Doom
quote: “Anthropologists! Anthropologists!”
abilities:
Instead of landing in the Graveyard, Characters killed by the Cannibals are removed from the game.

Swarm — 'Weapon' Props cannot defend against the Cannibals.
title: Cannibal

name: 12,000 Angry Rats
quote: "There were rats, dad..." "Rats??"
abilities: 'Swarm' — 'Weapon' Props cannot defend against the Rats.
title: Infestation

name: Evil Minions
quote: “What's Drax want with this stuff anyway?” “I don't ask Mr. Drax questions; I never like the answers.”
abilities: 'Psycho' — Any Player may play 'Weapon' Props to boost the Minions' attack for free.
title: Henchmen

name: Base Camp
quote: “If it’s called ‘Base Camp’, why is it so far up the mountain?”
abilities: Characters at Base Camp may ignore the Prop Limit (they may receive more than one Prop per turn). Defense = 0 against ‘Native’ attacks.
title: Forest

name: Ancient Proving Grounds
quote: "You must survive these tests..." "Please let it be a written exam!"
abilities: Once per turn, on your turn — You may Knock Out one of your Characters to give the Proving Grounds an additional +2 Defense token, up to 3 tokens.
title: Trials

name: Rickety Bi-Plane
quote: “Wild, blue yonder, eh? I’d be happier with a peaceful, green landing strip!”
abilities: On your turn you may pay 5 Popcorn to take a Location card from any other Movie or Graveyard, and play it at the Bi-Plane's Location.
title: Soaring

name: Holy Grail
quote: "The Holy Grail! That’s like the… well, you know."
abilities: Pay 4 Popcorn on your turn — Take a Character out of your Graveyard and play them in your Movie.
title: Grail

name: Human Sacrifice
quote: "I hear they’re looking to sacrifice a virgin…" "There's a cure for that, you know?"
abilities: Kill one of your Characters to either double the Strength of a ‘Native’ Attack (triple it if the Character was a 'Virgin') – OR – give the Trait 'Treasure' to a Prop currently in play and double its Printed Defense when calculating final scores.
title: Danger

name: Aging Potion
quote: “My only… regret… was… drinking… that damned potion.”
abilities: Attach to a Character. They now have the Trait ‘Old’. At the end of their Director's next turn, that Character dies.
title: Ageless

name: Power Corrupts
quote: "The Chalice of Isis is finally mine and I’m not gonna share it with any of you boobs!"
abilities: Kill a Character holding a 'Treasure' Prop.
title: Greed

name:
... And They Were the 
Good Guys All Along!
quote: "Hey... Hey! I'm on YOUR side!"
abilities: You may Bank this Twist when your Movie is being attacked by a NON-'Supernatural' Creature. If you do, stop the attack and play the Creature in your Movie as a 5 Defense Character with the Trait 'Smart'.
title: Allies

name: ... And X Marks the Spot!
quote: "And X NEVER marks— Oh! Would you look at that..."
abilities: Stating your next turn, if you have a Location card in your Movie, you may Bank this Twist. If you do, discard the entire Location, Bank its Printed Defense, and then search your Deck or Graveyard for a 'Treasure'. You may play it for free.
title: Dig

name: Roll the Credits
quote: "Well the crumbing monastery was reclaimed by the desert, so guess it's over!"
title: Disappeared

name: Antiquities Poacher
quote: “Yoink!”
abilities: Once per turn, on your turn — Pay 3 Popcorn to take a 'Treasure' Prop out of your Graveyard – or 6 Popcorn for a 'Treasure' Prop currently in play in any Movie – and give it to the Antiquities Poacher.
title: Thief

name: Camel
quote: “I said no camels, that’s five camels. Can’t you count?”
abilities: Despite being an 'Animal' the Camel may carry non-'Clothing' Props, but while on the Camel, they lose their Abilities. Discard a 'Prop' they are carrying to prevent the Camel from dying.
title: Hump

name: Nazi Troops
quote: “Evil yes, but you can’t fault their fashion sense.”
abilities:
Gains +3 Attack for every 'Supernatural' Prop in the defending Movie.

'Psycho' — Any Player may play 'Weapon' Props to boost the Nazis' attack for free.
title: Hitler

name: Why’d It Have to Be Snakes?
quote: “Just try to think of them as big, legless lizards!”
abilities:
For every 2 additional Popcorn you pay, you may double the Snakes' Attack Strength.

'Swarm' — 'Weapon' Props cannot defend against the Snakes.
title: Plane

name: Rival Archaeologist
quote: "It belongs in a museum!" "So do YOU!"
abilities:
Gains +3 Attack for each 'Treasure' currently in play, and if successful, instead of killing a Victim you may put a 'Treasure' from the defending Movie into your hand instead.

'Cool' — Special Effects cannot be played against the Rival.
title: Destruction

name: Ancient Temple
quote: "You don’t think this place is REALLY cursed... do you?"
abilities: Tip on your turn, Knock Out one of your Characters — Take a 'Treasure' out of your Graveyard and put it into your hand.
title: Ruins

name: Museum
quote: “Next on the tour is the ‘Terrible Little Savages’ exhibit.”
abilities: 'Treasures' are at +1 Defense at the Museum and 'Supernatural' attacks always succeed here.
title: Collection

name: Ark of the Covenant
quote: “It’s the Ark of the Covenant.” “You sure?” “Pretty sure.”
abilities:
Creature attacks you make are at +5 Attack Strength.

Treasure — Defense = 7 towards the Final Score.
title: Doom

name: Golden Idol
quote: "I hope the bottom isn’t stamped 'Made In Taiwan' like the last one."
abilities:
On your turn you may force another Player to discard a random card from their hand.

'Treasure' — Defense = 5 towards the Final Score.
title: Gold

name: Hat
quote: "What do you mean 'Just leave it?' It’s my HAT!"
abilities: The Character wearing the Hat gains the Trait 'Lucky' (— If there is a choice for killing Characters, they must be chosen last).
title: Rugged

name: Sandstorm
quote: “Wiped clean by the wrath of God.”
abilities: Stop and discard any card as it is being played OR discard one card currently in play from any Movie.
title: Erased

name: Digging in the Wrong Place
quote: "But that means they're..."
abilities: Take a 'Treasure' out of any Graveyard and place it into any other Graveyard.
title: Wrong

name: Tickets Please
quote: *WHAM!* ... "No ticket."
abilities: Every other Player discards two cards.
title: Fall

name:
... And They Survived the
Wrath of God!
quote: "Don't look at it! Not even a peek!"
abilities: Starting your next turn, if there is a 'Treasure' in your Movie, you may Bank this Twist. If you do, each Player then chooses one Character in their Movie. All other Characters are killed.
title: Purified

name:
... And She Talks in 
Her Sleep!
quote: "You knew all along... How??"
abilities: Starting your next turn you may Bank this Twist if there is at least one 'Female' in play. If you do, you may glance at the top X cards of any Opponent's Deck, where X is the number of 'Females' in play.
title: Snoring

name: Roll the Credits
quote: "Well they put their 'Top People' on it and made the relic disappear... so I guess it's over!"
title: Covenant

name: Great White Hunter
quote: “Horrible little savages, yes… but they do mix one hell of a gin and tonic!”
abilities:
Cannot be killed by a 'Native' or 'Monster' attack unless there is no one else to kill.

Can instead be played as a 'Psycho' attack with an Attack Strength of 10 + 5x the number of 'Native' Characters in the target Movie.
title: Destiny

name: Native Guide
quote: “You trust Ubushu. Ubushu know short cut.”
abilities: Gains +1 Defense for every other 'Native' Character you have in your Movie. No other Player can alter your Locations while the Guide is in play.
title: Pathway

name: Native Porter
quote: “Is B’wana sure four-poster bed needed for trek to sacred temple?”
abilities: Gains +1 Defense for every other 'Native' Character you have in your Movie.
title: Heavy

name: Hired Assassins
quote: "Kill them. A lot."
abilities:
The Assassins never kill the Character with the highest Defense in a given Movie (unless there's no other choice).

'Psycho' — Any Player may play 'Weapon' Props to boost the Boss' attack for free.
title: Hit

name: Crocodiles
quote: "I’ve never seen a log with such big teeth before!"
abilities:
If at an 'Aquatic' Location, the Crocodiles may choose the TWO Characters with the lowest Printed Defense as their Victim.

'Aquatic' — Attack Strength is double if attacking an 'Aquatic' Location.
title: Scaly

name: Safari Stampede
quote: "That's a lot of hooves, fangs, and claws coming our direction!"
abilities: Regardless of the outcome, once the Stampede resolves you may discard a Prop or Location from the defending Movie.
title: Trampled

name: Third-World Diamond Mine
quote: “It’s mine! Mine, mine, mine, mine, mine!”
abilities: When determining Final Scores, Defense = 7.
title: Cavernous

name: ... And Up a Tree!
quote: "Apparently the locals never look up!"
abilities: May be played over a 'Natural' Location in your Movie at any time to stop an attack against you. Otherwise, may be Combined with any 'Natural' Location.
title: Canopy

name: Big Canvas Tent
quote: "It’s like having all the comforts of home without actually having any of the comforts of home."
abilities: May be attached to 'Natural' Location cards as if they are Characters.
title: Adventure

name: Elephant Gun
quote: “See this gun? Shoots through herds.”
abilities: Defense = 6 in the hands of any “Hunter”.
title: Felled

name: River Crossing
quote: “Piranha, malaria, oppressive humidity… And this is the BEST place to cross?”
abilities: Double the strength of an 'Aquatic' attack, OR give the current attack the trait 'Aquatic' (— Attack Strength is double if attacking an 'Aquatic' Location).
title: Rain

name: Mother Lode
quote: "I think now is the time to do the money dance!"
abilities: Draw 3 cards, then discard a card.
title: Vein

name: Swarm
quote: "I’ve never seen an eclipse before." "That’s not an eclipse… those are bats."
abilities: Triple the Strength of one attack and give it the trait 'Swarm' (— 'Weapon' Props cannot defend against the attack).
title: Darkened

name:
... And They Resolved It With
a Dance-Off!
quote: "Ah, it's the Lion Dance of the Tutsi... Run!"
abilities: Starting your next turn, if you have at least one 'Native' Character in your Movie you may Bank this Twist. If you do, choose an existing Character Trait in another Movie. If your 'Native' Characters' Total Defense is greater or equal to the Total Defense of Characters with that Trait in that Movie, Knock Out those Characters. Otherwise, Knock Out your 'Native' Characters.
title: Lion

name:
... And He Was the King 
All Along!
quote: "It's the Circle of Life and all that..."
abilities: If you have a 'Native' Character in your Movie and an attack fails against you, you may Bank this Twist. If you do, attach this card to your 'Native' Character with the highest Printed Defense. They gain the Trait 'Royalty' and +3 Defense.
title: Monarch

name: Roll the Credits
quote: "So they survived the deepest darkest part of Africa... so I guess it's over!"
title: Continent

name: Unscrupulous Merchant
quote: "The Onyx Amulet of Cusco? Yes I can get one for you. You don’t mind if it’s slightly used do you?"
abilities:
Once per turn on your turn — Pay 3 Popcorn to look through your Deck and take a Prop into your hand. Shuffle.

Gains +1 Defense for every other 'Native' Character in your Movie.
title: Sly

name: Missionary
quote: “He’s got the whole world in his hands… c’mon everyone, sing along!”
abilities:
Pay 1 Popcorn — Remove the 'Native' Trait from a Character until the end of the turn.

Defense = 3 against 'Supernatural' attacks.
title: Righteous

name: Conquistador
quote: "And that's mine, and that's mine, and that's mine, too!"
abilities:
All 'Natives' in other Movies are at -1 Defense.

Can be played as a Special Effect to stop a 'Native' attack.
title: Cortez

name: Piranha
quote: “Says here they can strip the flesh off a cow in 5 minutes… who figures these things out?”
abilities:
'Aquatic' — Attack Strength is double if attacking an 'Aquatic' Location.

'Swarm' — 'Weapon' Props cannot defend against the Piranha.
title: Teeth

name: Vampire Bats
quote: “It’s just one of God’s little crea… AHHHHH! Get it off!!!!”
abilities:
'Swarm' — 'Weapon' Props cannot defend against the Bats.

Any Player may discard an 'Animal' to stop this attack.
title: Africa

name: Giant Ants
quote: “This is turning into the worst picnic EVER!”
abilities:
'Swarm' — 'Weapon' Props cannot defend against the Ants.

May be played as a Special Effect to take a Prop from another player’s Movie and give it to one of your Characters.
title: Mandibles

name: Lost City
quote: "The Lost City!" "How do you know?" "Simple, we’re lost and that’s a city."
abilities: 'Native' Characters in the Lost City each gain +1 Defense Strength.
title: Tribe

name: The Fountain of Youth
quote: "I think we’re going to need more baby food…"
abilities: Once per turn you may discard one 'Old' Character from your Movie and replace it with any non-'Old' Character (or one non-'Young' Character for a 'Young' Character) from your Graveyard, provided they each share at least one other Trait.
title: Youthful

name: Map
quote: “Says here ‘X marks the spot’, so I guess we should start looking for a big X.”
abilities: Other Players may not play Location cards at the Location of the Character holding the Map – but their Location may be destroyed.
title: Fortune

name: Stupid Amount of Gold
quote: "What do you mean leave it behind??!"
abilities:
'Treasure' — Defense = 10 when tallying final scores.
'Cursed' — Cannot be moved between Characters and can be played in any Movie.

The Character carrying the Gold gains the Trait 'Dumb', cannot change Locations, and if their Location is ever replaced, they die.
title: Greed

name: Booby Traps
quote: “Pit traps and boulders and spikes, oh my!”
abilities: Target Player must kill off Characters in their Movie with a combined Printed Defense of at least 3. If there are too few Characters to do so, all of their Characters are killed.
title: Deadly

name: City of Gold
quote: “How are we supposed to get a giant gold building back to the ship?”
abilities:
Before playing this card, you must kill a number of Characters in your Movie with a combined Printed Defense of 3 or more.

Attach this card to your Movie. Your hand limit is increased by 1.
title: Drudgery

name: Sacred Ground
quote: “You’re about to tread on sacred ground. The guides won't go any further. But that's because they are superstitious fools who don’t know how much you’re going to pay me...”
abilities: Kill all 'Native' Characters and any Characters with Creature Traits ('Vampire', 'Zombie', 'Werewolf' etc.) in a single Movie.
title: Sacred

name:
... And They Really
WERE a God!
quote: "Are you a god?" "Well actually yes. Yes I am. And a vengeful one, too!"
abilities: If your Movie is under a Creature attack you may Bank this Twist. If you do, stop the attack. Bank the Printed Defense of your Character who has the highest Printed Defense and remove them from the game. (They have ascended!)
title: Ascension

name:
... And It Was Lost to the
Mists of Time!
quote: "This is like that, Brig-a-something place, isn't it?"
abilities: Starting your next turn, if you have a Location card in play, you may Bank this Twist. If you do, Bank the Printed Defense of one of your Location cards and then remove it from the game.
title: Disappearing

name: Roll the Credits
quote: "Well they made off with an awful lot of gold... So I guess it's over!"
title: Riches

name: Jungle Man
quote: "Me kill rubber thing!"
abilities: Pay 3 Popcorn — Stop any 'Monster' attack.
title: Tarzan

name: Jungle Queen
quote: "I don't need binoculars to spot trouble – it's usually following me."
abilities: Defense = 6 against 'Native' and 'Monster' attacks. She may have the Trait 'Native' when convenient.
title: Jane

name: Skippy the Jungle Dog
quote: "What’s that Skippy? You think the sacred idol is cursed?"
abilities: 'Animal' - May only use 'Clothing' Props.
title: Treasure

name: Jungle Cat
quote: "Nice kitty…! Good kitty…!"
abilities: If "Jungle Man" or "Jungle Queen" are cast in your Movie, you may play Jungle Cat as a Character with 5 Defense and the Traits 'Large' and 'Animal' (may only use 'Clothing' Props).
title: Feline

name: Dinosaurs
quote: "That big lizard just ate our jeep!"
abilities: If the Dinosaurs succeed in their attack, they may destroy the Location instead of killing a Character.
title: Jurassic

name: Amazon Warriors
quote: "I’ve always had a weakness for tall women."
abilities:
'Psycho' — Any Player may play 'Weapon' Props to boost the Warriors' attack for free.

Cannot choose a 'Female' Victim.
title: Female

name: Ridiculously Elaborate Tree House
quote: "Look, I can’t remember the password, just let down the rope ladder!"
abilities: Defense = 7 against 'Monster' attacks, but Defense = -5 against ‘Native’ Attacks.
title: Hidden

name: Secluded Lagoon
quote: “Ahh! It’s the creature from the Blue Lagoon!”
abilities: 'Aquatic' Creatures always succeed at the Lagoon. May be combined with any 'Aquatic' Location.
title: Forbidden

name: Spear
quote: “An exemplary tool for hunting and making shish kebab of people.”
abilities: Defense = 6 if played on a 'Native'.
title: Hunt

name: Hunting Bow
quote: "Don’t let his appearance fool you! He’s a regular William Tell with that thing."
abilities: Defense = 4 if played on a ‘Native’.
title: Prehistoric

name: Leopard Skin Bikinis
quote: "Quick! Get ready for the final number!" "Wearing this??"
abilities: Play into your Movie after a Roll the Credits has been played to give +2 Defense to every non-'Old', 'Female' Character in your Movie.
title: Appeal

name: Swing to Safety
quote: "Watch out for that… Ooo!! … tree!"
abilities: Knock Out one of your Characters to stop one attack made against your Movie.
title: Flying

name: Gone Native
quote: "Ooga booga!"
abilities: Double the Strength of an attack and give it the trait 'Native'.
title: Jungle

name: ... And They Got Busy!
quote: "Several years later..."
abilities: Starting your next turn you may Bank this Twist if you have a 'Male' and 'Female' Character in play. If you do, both lose the Trait 'Virgin' and gain the Trait 'Family'. Play this card into your Movie. It becomes an exact duplicate of one of the couple, only it has -1 Defense, the Trait 'Young', and a Popcorn Bucket. If they are ever killed or removed, this card becomes a regular Banked Twist.
title: Junior

name:
... Doctor Livingstone, 
I Presume?
quote: "We thought you were lost in the jungle forever!"
abilities: Starting your next turn, when you play a new Location card you may Bank this Twist. If you do, take a Character from your Graveyard and play them at that Location. They gain the trait 'Old'.
title: Discovered

name: Roll the Credits
quote: "And they swung off into the sunset... so I guess it's over!"
title: Vines

name: Self-Made Man
quote: "Started from nothing, now I owe myself everything!"
abilities: Every time you use Popcorn generated by the Self-Made Man to successfully play a Character, Prop, or Location, he gains +1 Defense.
title: Bootstrap

name: Mail Order Bride
quote: "Trading city lights for jungle nights—hope there’s a return policy!"
abilities: If you successfully play a 'Male' Character into your Movie, you may play the Bride for free.
title: Post

name: Obstructionist Bureaucrat
quote: "If it’s urgent, why didn’t you submit it six months ago?"
abilities:
During an attack, 1 Popcorn, Tip — The attacking Director must pay 1 additional Popcorn, or the attack is stopped.

2 Popcorn, Tip — The Director playing a Special Effect must pay 1 additional Popcorn, or it is stopped and discarded.
title: Bureaucracy

name: Marabunta
quote: "Army Ants: 40 square miles of painful death!"
abilities:
When Marabunta attack, discard all 'Food' from the defending Movie. Attack = 15 against 'Natural' Locations.

Swarm — 'Weapons' cannot defend against Marabunta.
title: Ants

name: Rival Plantation Owner
quote: "Nice place you have here. Would be a SHAME if something happened to it..."
abilities:
If the Rival succeeds at a 'Natural' Location, in addition to killing a Victim, you may take one 'Natural' Location card there into your hand.

'Psycho' — Any Player may play 'Weapon' Props to boost the Rival's attack for free.
title: Title Word

name: Menacing Natives
quote: "You better watch your back, Señor!"
abilities: Gains +3 attack for each 'Native' Character currently in play.
title: Gang

name: Native Bug Spray
quote: "It smells AWFUL, but works... right?"
abilities: Defense = 5 against 'Swarm' attacks. Discard from play to stop a 'Swarm' attack.
title: Stench

name: Shrunken Head
quote: "Every time it talks, I lose another night’s sleep..."
abilities:
The Character carrying the Shrunken Head cannot defend against 'Native' Attacks.

Cursed — Cannot be moved between Characters. May be played into an Opponent's Movie.
title: Diminished

name: Cocoa Plantation
quote: "Chocolate *was* used as currency by the ancients for a reason!"
abilities: All Characters at this Location may be tipped to produce Popcorn.
title: Chocolate

name: Jungle River
quote: "Quick! Get across the river!"
abilities: 'Swarm' attacks automatically fail at the Jungle River.
title: Rapid

name: Sudden Silence
quote: "Can you hear that?" "I hear nothing." "That's what's worrying me!"
abilities: Play at any time, except during an attack, to launch an attack normally (i.e. pay the attack's Popcorn cost etc.. Special attacks like Brawls and Duels, too.).
title: Silence

name: Blow Up the Dam!
quote: "Blow it! Blow it now!"
abilities: Destroy an 'Aquatic' Location card OR stop a 'Swarm' attack. Or you may do both, if they are at the same Location.
title: Washed

name: Slept Through It
quote: "What happened?! I was napping..."
abilities: Knock Out any Character. They cannot be chosen as a Victim until after they next Wake Up.
title: Slumber

name: ... But I'm Staying!
quote: "And what will happen when they see me leave?"
abilities: If one of your 'Native' Characters has been chosen as a Victim, and you have a 'Female' in your Movie, you may Bank this Twist. If you do, the attack is immediately over and the Attacker cannot choose a new Victim.
title: Stubborn

name: ... But I DO Love You!
quote: "Which is why I've got to do this!"
abilities: If your Movie is under a Creature attack and the attacking Player has at least one Character, you may Bank this Twist. If you do, play one of their Characters (with all attachments) into your Movie and give them the Trait 'Unlucky' for the duration of the attack. If they survive, they return to their prior Movie as before. If they die, their Director may redistribute their Props.
title: Foolish

name: Roll the Credits
quote: "Well the dam burst, and the entire plantation is drifting off downstream... so I guess it's over!"
title: Calm

name: Rugged Adventurer
quote: "Danger? Just another word for Tuesday."
abilities: 'Females' in your Movie cannot be targeted by Creature attacks, and the Adventurer gains +1 Defense for every 'Treasure' in your Movie.
title: Rugged

name: Chased Woman
quote: "All I did was escape! Why are they after me??"
abilities:
May have the Trait 'Virgin' when convenient.

Pay 1 Popcorn ­— Take the Chased Woman back into your hand.
title: Pursuit

name: Civilized Savage
quote: "How drole, sir. And to think I wasted my time studying this at university..."
abilities: 'Native' when convenient, and can make one other Character in their Movie 'Native' or NON-'Native' when convenient.
title: Sharp

name: Local Government Officials
quote: "Papers please!"
abilities: Gains +3 Attack for each NON-'Native' Character in the defending Movie.
title: Papers

name: Crooked Trader
quote: "I WANT that amulet. I want it BAD..."
abilities:
If the Crooked Trader is successful, you may take all of Victim's Props into your Hand.

'Psycho' — Any Player may play 'Weapon' Props to boost the Trader's Attack for free.
title: Obsession

name: Sniper For Hire
quote: "Sorry, nothing personal. It's just business. Now hold still..."
abilities: Instead of a conventional Creature attack, the Sniper Duels with one Victim. You may also play one 'Gun' with the Sniper to double their Attack.
title: Sight

name: Incan Sunburst
quote: "Yeah, I found it on eBay."
abilities:
The Sunburst gets +1 Defense for each 'Native' in play.

'Treasure' — The Sunburst's Printed Defense = 5 when calculating the final score.
title: Sun

name: Leather Jacket
quote: "I'm selling these fine leather jackets..."
abilities: Defense = 3 against 'Native' or 'Monster' attacks.
title: Leather

name: Machu Picchu
quote: Where the air is thin, but the mysteries are thick!
abilities:
Gains +1 Defense for each 'Native' Character at this Location. 

'Native' attacks against Machu Picchu are at half strength, rounded up.
title: Altitude

name: Local Airfield
quote: "Terminally close to home."
abilities:
All 'Flying' 'Vehicles' gain +3 Defense at the Local Airport.

On your turn, if there is a 'Flying' 'Vehicle' present, you may search your Deck for another Location card, and play it over the Local Airport.
title: Sky

name: Shaft of Light
quote: "A light at the end of the tunnel... and this time it’s not a train!"
abilities: Reveal a Treasure from your Deck and put it into your hand. Shuffle afterwards.
title: Shiny

name: Just a Touch of Exotica
quote: "Sweet as a songbird. Graceful as a dance. Deadly as a blade!"
abilities: Play in a Movie. All 'Females' there are now 'Native'.
title: Mysterious

name: They Speak the Language
quote: "Yeah, I caught that. And the same to you, buddy!"
abilities: Attach to a Character. When not drawing cards, all other Movies play with the top card of their Deck face-up.
title: Listening

name:
... Curse Your Inevitable
Betrayal!
quote: "Ha ha ha! Mine is an evil laugh!"
abilities: Starting your next turn you may Bank this Twist. If you do, choose two Characters in the same Movie. They Duel each other. The loser dies.
title: Backstabbed

name:
... And They Fell 
By Their Own Hand!
quote: "Well, well, well... If it isn't the consequences of my own actions."
abilities: Starting your next turn, if your Movie is under a Creature attack you may Bank this Twist. If you do, the Creature is now targeting its Owner's Movie.
title: Regret

name: Roll the Credits
quote: "Well they got the sacred gold dingus back to the natives, so I guess it's over!"
title: Sun

name: Commando Man
quote: "Geht behind me! Naaaoouugh!"
abilities: If your Movie is under attack, you may discard a 'Gun' on the Commando Man to add 3x the 'Gun's Total Defense for the duration.
title: Commando

name: Native Commando
quote: "Blend in? I practically invented it."
abilities: Defense is +2 for each 'Natural' card at his Location.
title: Billy

name: Army General
quote: "We have our orders, soldier! They suck, but they're our orders!"
abilities:
All 'Military' and 'Cops' have +1 Defense at his Location when cast in your Movie.

Can instead be played as a 'Military' Creature with an Attack Strength equal to the Total Defense of all 'Military' Characters in your Movie.
title: Star

name: Alien Hunter
quote: "Whooee! I don't have one of those naked apes in my trophy case yet..."
abilities:
If the Hunter is successful, remove their Victim from the game and Bank their Printed Defense.

'Psycho' — Any Player may play 'Weapon' Props to boost the Hunter's attack for free.
title: Predator

name: Jungle That Came Alive
quote: "I don't know what happened!! It's like the jungle just came alive and ate him!"
abilities:
Automatically succeeds at any 'Natural' Location.

If successful, in addition to taking a Victim,  you may Knock Out an additional Character in the targeted Movie.
title: Jungle

name: Dog Tags
quote: "If found, please return to base."
abilities: If the Character wearing the Dog Tags is killed, you may Bank their Printed Defense.
title: Memorial

name: Retractable Claws
quote: *SNIKT!* "What was that...?!"
abilities:
When in play, Pay 1 Popcorn — Return Retractable Claws to your hand.

Defense = 5 if played on a 'Psycho' Creature.
title: Claw

name: Minigun
quote: "It's like having an argument with God!"
abilities: You can discard the Minigun and shout "Ahhhhhh!" to add +10 Defense to your Movie until the end of an attack.
title: Obliteration

name: Guerilla Camp
quote: "Huh... they don't look like monkeys. They look like soldiers!" "Not 'gorilla', idiot."
abilities:
'Native' and 'Military' cards (other than the Camp) get +1 Defense here.

Can be combined with any 'Natural' Location.
title: Resistance

name: Military Helicopter
quote: "Heroes drop in, villains run for cover!"
abilities:
You may play Characters and Props at the Helicopter's Location at any time.

May be combined with any NON-'Indoor', NON-'Underground' Location.
title: Chopper

name: Manly Test of Strength
quote: "Good to see you, you son of a-- OOF!"
abilities: Choose two 'Males' in play. Knock Out the one with the lowest Printed Defense and give the other +1 Defense until the end of the turn.
title: Test

name: Predator Vision
quote: *THUMP-thump!* *THUMP-thump!*
abilities: Play during a Creature attack. All Characters in the defending Movie are at -1 until the end of the attack. -2 if it's an 'Alien' attack.
title: Perception

name: Out of Ammo
quote: *Click!* *Click!* *Click!*
abilities: Discard a 'Weapon' currently in play. If it's a 'Gun' you may play Out of Ammo for free.
title: Empty

name: ...But He Made a Last Stand!
quote: "Come at me!!! I dare ya!"
abilities: If your Movie is under a Creature attack and you have a 'Military' Character in play, you may Bank this Twist. If you do, the attack is now a Duel against one 'Military' Character in your Movie of your choice.
title: Stand

name: Get to the CHOPPAHHH!
quote: "GO! Run! --"
abilities: When one of your Characters is Knocked Out or killed, you may Bank this Twist. If you do, return one of your remaining Characters to your Hand. Then, you may search through your Deck or Graveyard and put a 'Flying' 'Vehicle' into play. Shuffle afterwards.
title: Fleeing

name: Roll the Credits
quote: "Well, they got to the chopper. So I guess it's over!"
title: Extracted

name: Wild Man
quote: "Quick! Give me a stick and some leaves. I’ll figure it out!"
abilities:
You may tip the Wild Man to play a 'Native' card, as you would normally, for free.

'Native' when convenient.
title: Wild

name: Rich Parents
quote: "Their trust fund is bigger than your monster problem."
abilities: All 'Young' Characters in your Movie can be tipped for Popcorn.
title: Dead

name: Orphans
quote: "With my plan, we should be able to ELIMINATE all orphans by next year!"
abilities: If a NON-'Young' 'Family' Character dies in your Movie, you may immediately play the Orphans for free.
title: Alone

name: Pack of Bullies
quote: "You're dead meat, foureyes!"
abilities: The Bullies' Attack Strength is at +7 for every 'Young' Character in the target Movie, and they may only choose a 'Young' Character as their Victim.
title: Bully

name: Mosquitoes Like Harrier Jets
quote: "He looks like a raisin! What could have done that?"
abilities:
When you attack you may choose if they are also 'Vampire'.

Instead of taking a Victim, you may place a -1 Defense Token on each Character in the defending Movie.

Swarm — 'Weapon' Props cannot defend against the Mosquitoes.
title: Sucking

name: Colonel Monocle
quote: "Gotcha, you little blighter!"
abilities:
You may play Colonel Monocle face-down as a Plot Twist. If so, whenever he is revealed, you may attack with him immediately, discarding him afterwards. Starting your next turn, you may reveal him at any time (except during an attack) by paying his Popcorn cost. 
'Psycho' — Any Player may play 'Weapon' Props to boost the Colonel's attack for free.
title: Ambush

name: Parents' Grave
quote: "Yeah I see them every once and a while... they're over in the cemetery."
abilities: May be combined with any other 'Mortuary'. May be immediately played for free if a NON-'Young' 'Family' Character in your Movie is killed.
title: Gone

name: ... Reclaimed by the Jungle
quote: "Wow... the vines grew *through* it!"
abilities:
Cannot stand on its own. May be Combined with any other Location card. 

All Location cards at its Location or played into its Location have the Trait 'Natural' so long as Reclaimed by the Jungle is in play.
title: Overgrown

name: High Powered Rifle
quote: "You're not a postal worker... are you?"
abilities:
Defense = 8 against 'Monsters' and 'Animals'.

Grants the bearer (Character OR 'Psycho' Creature) the ability to Duel.
title: Boom

name: Cursed Board Game
quote: "One wrong move, and it's game over — literally!"
abilities:
Right after the Director of the Movie the Board Game's in fills up at the beginning of their turn, they reveal the top card of their Deck. If it's a Creature, it attacks their Movie immediately, and will target the Character with the lowest Total Defense (they choose if there's a tie). Whatever the card revealed was, once things are resolved it goes to the bottom of the Deck.
Cursed — May be played into another Movie, and cannot be moved between Characters normally.
title: Game

name: Meanwhile in the Past...
quote: "I remember it like it was only yesterday..."
abilities: Choose a Movie. The following happens in it: Knock Out all 'Young' Characters. Until the end of the turn, all NON-'Old' gain the Trait 'Young' and all 'Old' Characters lose the Trait 'Old'.
title: Flashback

name: Cat in the Closet
quote: "AHH!! Ape in the cupboard!"
abilities: Stop any card as it is being played. It is discarded. This cannot stop a Plot Twist or Roll the Credits.
title: Surprise

name: Many Years Later
quote: "And the wheel of life turns, and the next generation takes up the mantle..."
abilities: Choose a Movie. The following happens in it: All 'Young' Characters lose the Trait 'Young'. All originally NON-'Old' Characters become 'Old'. All originally 'Old' Characters become 'Young'.
title: Forward

name: ... Wait, You Heard it, Too?
quote: "So we're agreed: *Neither* of us are going down there first!"
abilities: Starting your next turn, if one of your Characters is the sole target of an ability, attack, or Special Effect, you may Bank this Twist. If you do, you may choose one more of your Characters to be included as the target OR subject to a duplicate effect.
title: Team

name: ... And it Ate the Car!
quote: "Fine! Take it! I didn't want it anyway!"
abilities: Starting your next turn, if during an attack there is a 'Vehicle' in play, you may Bank this Twist. If you do, discard the 'Vehicle' and double the attack's Strength.
title: Crush

name: Roll the Credits
quote: "Well it all got sucked back into the board game... so I guess it's over!"
title: Game

name: Imminent Groom
quote: "I hope you like old fashioned weddings.""I prefer old-fashioned wedding NIGHTS."
abilities: Gains the Trait 'Family' and Defense = 4 if a "Bride" is in the same Movie.
title: Wedding

name: White Witch Doctor
quote: "I didn't appropriate anything. I *tortured* those secrets out of him!"
abilities: You may play 'Native' Characters from your Graveyard for 2 Popcorn, but they gain the Trait 'Zombie' (— they are 'Dumb', 'Supernatural', and cannot use Abilities, Popcorn, or Props).
title: Voodoo

name: Island Villagers
quote: "Sa pa bon — trust me on that one!"
abilities: Draw a card for each 'Native' Character in your Movie that dies (including this one).
title: Tropical

name: Haitian Voodoo Zombies
quote: "The dead have risen from the grave... and they've learned the mambo!"
abilities: Gains +2 Attack Strength for each 'Native' in play.
title: Haiti

name: Zombie Slaves
quote: "In their lifetime, they were my enemies."
abilities: Gains +3 Attack Strength for each 'Zombie' in play.
title: Slaves

name: Evil Voodoo Master
quote: "I've got Voodoo, I've got Hoodoo, I've got things I ain't even tried!"
abilities: The Master's Attack Strength is equal to the combined Printed Defense of all 'Zombie' Characters AND Characters in Graveyards.
title: Master

name: Zombie Draught
quote: "Just a sip... and you gain 'Immortality'!" "Uhm... Why the air quotes?"
abilities:
The Character bearing the Draught gains 'Zombie' (— They are 'Dumb', 'Supernatural', and cannot use Abilities, Popcorn, or Props) OR you may discard from your hand to grant 'Zombie' to an attack.

'Cursed' — Cannot be moved between Characters normally and may be played into another Movie.
title: Wasted

name: Voodoo Doll
quote: "Ow! Ow! Ow! Ow!"
abilities: Once per Creature attack — Pay 2 Popcorn to Knock Out target Character, OR if the bearer is also carrying the "Sharp Stake", instead of Popcorn they may discard the "Stake" to kill that Character instead.
title: Distance

name: Hazardous Sugar Mill
quote: "You will yearn for the sweet, sweet release of death!"
abilities: When one of your Characters dies at this Location, instead of going to the Graveyard, you may instead immediately play them back at the Mill as a Defense = 1 'Zombie' (— they are 'Dumb', 'Supernatural', and cannot use Abilities, Popcorn, or Props).
title: Sweet

name: Crossroads
quote: "Great... Lost even in the afterlife!"
abilities: The Crossroads has all of the Traits of the Location cards it is Combined with. If a 'Supernatural' Creature or Character fails in an attack against the Crossroads, they are Removed from the game. May be Combined with any other NON-'Indoors' Location card.
title: Choice

name: Voodoo Ritual
quote: "What’s the worst that could happen? ...Wait, don’t answer that."
abilities: Discard a Special Effect that is attached to another card, or move it to another valid target.
title: Hoodoo

name: Zombie Grip
quote: "Arise and perform my every desire!"
abilities: Search your Graveyard for a 'Zombie' or choose a 'Zombie' currently in play and place it into your hand.
title: Decaying

name: Tragic Backstory
quote: "No! Don't leave me, Skippy!"
abilities: Remove a Character in your Movie from the game. Attach this card to one of your remaining Characters. They gain the killed Character's Printed Defense (an additional +1 if it was a 'Family' Character that was removed).
title: Tragic

name:
... They Were Rendered 
Powerless!
quote: "With these zombie eyes..."
abilities: Starting your next turn, when an Opponent tips one of their Characters you may Bank this Twist. If you do, tipping them is interrupted and they are Knocked Out. They do not Wake Up for as long as this Twist stays in play.
title: Powerless

name:
... But They Came Shambling 
Out of the Graveyard!
quote: "NNNG! NNNNG!"
abilities: Starting your next turn, if you have a Character in your Graveyard you may Bank this Twist. If you do, play that Character into your Movie and give them the Trait 'Zombie' (— they are 'Dumb', 'Supernatural', and cannot use Abilities, Popcorn, or Props).
title: Decaying

name: Roll the Credits
quote: "It's downhill from here, folks... so I guess it’s over!"
title: Plunge
